mapper.select: select ET.EMPLOYEE_TRAINING_CODE, ET.EMPLOYEE_TRAINING_NAME, ETL.EMPLOYEE_CODE, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, ET.EMPLOYEE_TRAINING_START_DATE, ET.EMPLOYEE_TRAINING_END_DATE, ETL.ASSESSMENT_DESC from EMPLOYEE_TRAINING ET, EMPLOYEE_TRAINING_LIST ETL, EMPLOYEE E where ETL.employee_training_code = ET.employee_training_code and E.employee_code = ETL.employee_code

select EBT.EMPLOYEE_CODE, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, EBT.COUNTRY, EBT.AREA, EBT.START_DATE, EBT.END_DATE, EBT.FLIGHT_COST, EBT.TOTAL_COST, EBT.PURPOSE ,EBT.BUSINESS_TRIP_CODE from EMPLOYEE E,EMPLOYEE_BUSINESS_TRIP EBT where E.EMPLOYEE_CODE = EBT.EMPLOYEE_CODE

select EL.EMPLOYEE_CODE, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, L.LICENSE_NAME, L.LICENSE_CODE, EL.START_DATE, EL.END_DATE, EL.LICENSE_NUMBER, EL.INSTITUTE, EL.BONUS from EMPLOYEE E,EMPLOYEE_LICENSE EL, LICENSE L where E.EMPLOYEE_CODE = EL.EMPLOYEE_CODE and L.LICENSE_CODE = EL.LICENSE_CODE

select ELA.EMPLOYEE_CODE, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, LA.LANGUAGE_NAME, LA.LANGUAGE_CODE, ELA.START_DATE, ELA.END_DATE, ELA.GRADE, ELA.PERCENT, ELA.INSTITUTE from EMPLOYEE E,EMPLOYEE_LANGUAGE ELA, LANGUAGE LA where E.EMPLOYEE_CODE = ELA.EMPLOYEE_CODE and LA.LANGUAGE_CODE = ELA.LANGUAGE_CODE
